spec_data.Name: rubygem-syntax
spec_data.Description:
Syntax is a lexical analysis framework. It supports pluggable syntax
modules, and comes with modules for Ruby, XML, and YAML.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:33:34 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ruby library for performing simple syntax highlighting
